News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.page_title: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v FC Halifax Town
News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggers' Emirates FA Cup home game against FC Halifax Town has been named as Neil Hair
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Samuel Ogles and Michael Ryan with the fourth official being Jack Packman

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
